- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "babiarz3" <babiarz3@...> wrote:>> Let's not =
twist words here. Show me where Chris has said you "only"> get false commun=
ication or bad guys. > BTW I thought we were trying to get the negativity b=
ehind us and move> on to constructive discussion. Guess that's more of the =
wishy-washy> depends on what my hair feels like doing ways here. from his o=
wn blog (clipped, but not otherwise altered):"Wednesday, November 28, 2007T=
he Box has hit the fan!Current mood: distressed"I have recentlybeen made aw=
are that there are several replica versions of thisdevice being sold. I hav=
e also been told of another device that canbe purchased for very little fro=
m any electronics merchant andaltered by hand, producing what some consider=
 to be results. As Iexpected, the samples that people have sent me are *not=
hing morethan timed radio scans that have no validity.* [emphasis mine]"The=
se new "radio scanners" are not only *a waste of money* forpeople looking t=
o do research with them in hopes of havingeffective communication with the =
other side, but may in fact be *verydangerous*. Should demonic and other ne=
gative entities learn to usethese falsedevices, *the results could be devas=
tating.*"...The Catholic Church ... predicted the widespread sale of*false =
communication devices* as far back as last year. *I have recentlybegun to r=
eceive requests from individuals asking for help to closenegative doorways =
and portals that they believe they opened usingtheir purchased Telephone to=
 the Dead replica*. Others are claiming> that I am a fraud because their pu=
rchased device doesn't producethe positive results I have been fortunate en=
ough to have."So let's go throug this again:*nothing more than timed radio =
scans that have no validity.**a waste of money**very dangerous**the results=
 could be devastating.**false communication devices**I have recently begun =
to receive requests from individuals asking forhelp to close negative doorw=
ays and portals that they believe theyopened using their purchased Telephon=
e to the Dead replica.*As you see, there are two statements that Chris is m=
aking--so much forhe's always consistant, which I believe was an earlier st=
atement thatyou made.1. The new boxes create accidental timed radio scans o=
nly.2. The new boxes are very dangerous because they draw negative results.=
I'm not sure how the two statements can stand together, but in eithercase, =
his opinion is clearly not complimentary toward the rest of thebox users be=
sides the four of the 30 he says, in the same post, "havebeen identified."R=
ather cheeky and insulting and wrong, HMO. But if he just goes ondoing sess=
ions like the one APSR recorded, I will continue to laud them.Ann
